review:
I know this doctor for the last three years. He is very gentle , polite , experienced doctor having through knowledge of kidney diseases. 
His Consultancy is excellent.
He should not shift to other hospital so frequent , which creates problem in finding him as shifted from fortis Faridabad to fortis noida then to sector 41 hospital noida,
Regards
Vijay Gupta

I have visited him twice including the follow up. Even though I had a confirmed appointment through Practo, they did not consider that. They will allow us to consult according to the billing. So, beyond prior booking, I had to wait for an hour. But the doctor was really good. He precisely explained the condition and the given treatment have satisfied me to a great extent.

I think doc was very busy and infact he consulted two patient at a time. I asked for related symptoms of bad digestion which he asked me to go to my previous doc. I was there for second opinion. Not a very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ),BP with Kidney Disease,Nephropathy,Kidney Transplant,
review:
Excellent Doctor. Very good knowledge. Very polite, very friendly behaviour. You can ask any question to doctor. Very very very good doctor. 
Kidney transplantation of my 18 years old son done by Dr varun Verma, in Fortis Hospital, Sec 62, Noida. New life given to my son by this Dr Varun Verma.
Alok Saxena
